## To do by Friday

### Final Design and Implementation Plan
- Upload it to Box in PDF format with your Capstone Project short name (e.g., GaiaFuture Design and Implementation Plan.pdf).
- Email to your faculty advisor and client: be professional and thank them for their involvement.

### Project Repository
- Enter a link to your project repository on this Google sheet. This can be a link to your Capstone project GitHub organization or a specific repository. 

### Peer/Self Evaluation
- Each student must complete a Capstone Project Peer & Self Evaluation Form for Winter Quarter. 
- Upload your evaluation form to Box and save your document with your Capstone Project short name and your full name as the file name (e.g., SaferSeafood Emily Case).
- You must also email your evaluation directly to your faculty advisor.
